extension.summary: Skin based on the Fire TV UI
extension.description: Fork of Hitcher's fTV skin with nearly full PVR functionality, plus changed a lot of behaviours and added dozens of other features[CR][CR]Skin description: Provides the look and feel of the Fire TV user interface.[CR]For the complete experience enable 'TV Show wide icons' and either use Artwork Downloader to grab logos or create your own artwork and add it to the database (see forum for more details).
